programme.title: Sing Along With Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Happy Birthday to You, Wheels on the Bus, Walking, Walking, To Market, To Market, Hickory Dickory Dock, I am a Musician, Brooms Party, Wind the Bobbin up, Down by the Station, Rain, Rain, Go Away

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Best Friends, Cap and Posty name the two trees 'Friendship Tree' because the flower which blooms on each tree connects them.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Mary and Cleany play hide and seek in the construction site. Mary falls asleep while she is hiding inside of the pipe line.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Escape from the energy crisis & Whose side should I be on?
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - The energy in Broom's town runs out. Although everyone should conserve energy until solar energy is recharged, nobody cares.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Be healthy & Our new friend, Whooper
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Helly cannot go out with Rescue team because of his broken propeller. While Rescue Team saves Terry who gets an accident, they feel the absence of Helly.

programme.title: Robocar POLI SongSong Museum
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - The Farmer in the Dell | Rock-a-bye Baby | Wheels on the Bus | Skidamarink

programme.title: Robocar POLI Safety Series
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - A Fire in the Forest! | Stop, Drop, and Roll | Never Move a Fire Extinguisher | Appliance Safety

programme.title: Robocar POLI Safety Series
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Microwave Safety | Peter, Firefighter for One Day | Shouting FIRE! | Never, Ever Play with Fire

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Rody is a liar & Greedy Mr. Wheeler
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Rody lies for fun. Rody often finds it amusing to trick others and keeps lying. One day, however, Whooper gets into dangerous accident because of Rody’s lie.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: I like the circus & Swampy situation
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day, Circus comes to broom’s town and performs excellent tricks and moves. From the very next day, Spooky starts to mimic the tricks.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Mini decides to get reading glasses for her grand father, as a surprise birthday gift. With rescue team member Jin’s help, Mini makes reading glasses and heads back home.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Let’s play together, Poke & Thank you, Cleany
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Poke, being a mute, is not able to play word puzzle with his friends. Discouraged by this fact, Poke decides to run away, far from his friends.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Spooky and swarm of bees & I like myself
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Spooky, while on his way to the picnic, finds a bee and starts to follow it.

programme.title: Play With Robocar POLI
programme.desc: It’s Christmas! How does the Rescue Team celebrate? Let’s enjoy a fantastic Christmas with Robocar POLI!

programme.title: Robocar POLI Safety Series
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Jaywalking is dangerous | How to cross the street safely | School bus safety | Streetwise

programme.title: Robocar POLI Safety Series
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Look out for blind spots! | Rainy day dangers | Rules of the road | Play ball safely

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Annie is sad that unlike other friend’s parents, her parents are very busy to take her to on a trip. When Schoolbi hears her story, he decides to take Annie out on a short trip.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: A friend under the sea & Thinking of granddaughter
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Marine brings a singing dolphin, Mingming, to a harbor and introduces Mingming to friends. On that night, Mingming accidentally swallows a can which has been thrown away in the ocean.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Recycling machine gets broken at Cleany’s recycling center, and trashes start to pile up. Cleany tries to clean up the mess and accidentally runs over the glue and gets stuck.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: I want it & Where are you, Jin
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Mini finds the snowball which Mr.Wheeler has lost. However, when Mr. Wheeler comes back to look for it, Mini lies to him, wanting to keep the snowball.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Poke & Weird SchoolB
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - At the construction site, Poke finds a dandelion while digging the ground. Poke decides to keep the dandelion alive and plants it in the remote area without telling anyone.

programme.title: Robocar POLI Safety Series
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Let’s Play Safely in the Playground | Be Careful when the Wind is Strong | A Candy is Caught in My Throat! | Bees Show up

programme.title: Robocar POLI Safety Series
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - The Fuss of Catching the Thieves | A Heated Dilemma! | Wild about Safety! | Crowd Control!

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Brave Mr. Musty & Please hear me out
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Mr. Musty goes to the toy store with ‘Little Trio’ and in the store, he spots TRUCK X who kidnaps ‘Tiny Trio’. Mr. Musty chases TRUCK X but he is too old to catch him.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Whenever Cap gets muddy on his body, he stops playing and goes to wash off. Wanting to keep the body clean, Cap stays and keeps putting on soap in the car wash machine.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Harmony of Broomstown part 1 & Harmony of Broomstown part 2
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Jin announces the shocking news that there will be a audition for choir members, and the members will participate in the big choir contest held in the big city.

programme.title: Sing Along With Robocar POLI
programme.desc: It’s Okay to Make Mistakes, Let’s Get Along, Don’t Rush, Let’s Clean, Wash It Squeaky Clean, Don’t Whine. Be Polite!, Say It Clear With No Tears, Sad Thumb, It’s Alright, Wiggly Finger, In The Potty, I Can Eat Healthy, Squeaky Clean, The Greeting Song, Sleep Well, Skidaraminky-doo, If You're Happy and You Know it, The More We Get Together

programme.title: Sing Along With Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Brave Rescue Team Song / The Cleany‘s Cleaning Song / School Bus Safety Song / Go! Go! Construction Team / Brooms Town Harbour Team
